headline: Corrections & Amplifications
summary: CORRECTIONS A photo of a Ford Super Duty vehicle in production was misidentified as a Ford Expedition in a caption with a Business & Finance article on Thursday about the U.S. auto industry. The U.S. unemployment rate for people ages 22 to 27 was 4.

headline: Tariff fog looms over US auto sector as semiconductor rules remain unclear
summary: Investing.com -- The US auto industry is bracing for fallout from President Trump’s proposed 100% tariff on semiconductor imports, with confusion mounting over how the measures will apply to chips used in cars.

headline: Trump's tariffs are pummeling top automakers. The hit is $11.7 billion — and climbing
summary: The auto sector is taking President Trump's tariffs on the chin. Toyota, the world's largest automaker, was the latest to reveal the impact it's seeing from tariffs in its earnings on Thursday morning, with slightly over $3 billion wiped from its fiscal Q1 (June 30) operating income.
